briefTitle: Study of Lumacaftor in Combination With Ivacaftor in Subjects 6 Through 11 Years of Age With Cystic Fibrosis, Homozygous for the F508del-CFTR Mutation
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Open-label Study to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics, Safety, and Tolerability of Lumacaftor in Combination With Ivacaftor in Subjects 6 Through 11 Years of Age With Cystic Fibrosis, Homozygous for the F508del-CFTR Mutation
summary: This is a Phase 3, 2-part (Part A and Part B), open-label, multicenter study to evaluate the pharmacokinetics, safety, and tolerability of lumacaftor in combination with ivacaftor in subjects with cystic fibrosis aged 6 to 11 years who have the F508del-mutation in the cystic fibrosis transmembrane conductance regulator (CFTR) gene.

primaryOutcome.measure: Part A: Observed Plasma Concentration of Lumacaftor (LUM) and Ivacaftor (IVA) at Hour 4 Post-dose (C4h) on Day 1

commonTop: Infective pulmonary exacerbation of cystic fibrosis
